question: The web-based application e-FRRO (e-Foreigners Regional Registration Office) scheme was launched by ____________.
explanation: Home Minister Rajnath Singh launched the web-based application e-FRRO (e-Foreigners Regional Registration Office) scheme. Under which foreigners can avail, various visa and immigration-related services online. This scheme is aimed at building a centralised, transparent online platform for foreigners to avail of visa-related services.
